meanings.sent1: My friend and I comakes a delicious cake for the party.
meanings.sent2: The team comakes decisions on important matters together.
meanings.sent3: The siblings comakes a mess in the kitchen while trying to bake cookies.
meanings.sent5: Working together comakes the task easier and more fun.

meanings.definition: To make or produce together with others.
meanings.sent1: The company comakes cars with advanced technology.
meanings.sent2: Farmers comakes fresh produce to sell at the market.
meanings.sent3: The students comakes a creative video for their school project.
meanings.sent5: Teamwork comakes the dream work in the business world.
